#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,x,gc,i;
    t=read_int();
    while(t--)
    {
        n=read_int();
        gc=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            if(gc==0)
                gc=x;
            else
            {
                if(x>gc)
                    gc=gcd(x,gc);
                else
                    gc=gcd(gc,x);
            }
        }
        cout<<gc<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
